<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The range &#91;FirstLiteralRelocationKind, MaxTargetFixupKind) is used for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// relocations coming from .reloc directive. Fixup kind</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// FirstLiteralRelocationKind+V represents the relocation type with number V.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a1864d2003d3e30137067084e7f2e7898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a1864d2003d3e30137067084e7f2e7898">FirstLiteralRelocationKind</a> = 256,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Set limit to accommodate the highest reloc type in use for all Targets,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// currently R&#95;AARCH64&#95;IRELATIVE at 1032, including room for expansion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a59a8b044cb17aa6a16dd766e02308afe"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a59a8b044cb17aa6a16dd766e02308afe">MaxFixupKind</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a1864d2003d3e30137067084e7f2e7898">FirstLiteralRelocationKind</a> + 1032 + 32,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Encode information on a single operation to perform on a byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sequence (e.g., an encoded instruction) which requires assemble- or run-</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// time patching.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Fixups are used any time the target instruction encoder needs to represent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// some value in an instruction which is not yet concrete. The encoder will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// encode the instruction assuming the value is 0, and emit a fixup which</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// communicates to the assembler backend how it should rewrite the encoded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// During the process of relaxation, the assembler will apply fixups as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// symbolic values become concrete. When relaxation is complete, any remaining</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fixups become relocations in the object file (or errors, if the fixup cannot</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be encoded on the target).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcfixup">MCFixup</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The value to put into the fixup location. The exact interpretation of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// expression is target dependent, usually it will be one of the operands to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// an instruction or an assembler directive.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;Value = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The byte index of start of the relocation inside the MCFragment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The target dependent kind of fixup item this is. The kind is used to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// determine how the operand value should be encoded into the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58">MCFixupKind</a> Kind = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a84cef097f15848752272d38769011f58a845a63cbed041d42d8c3452991d629c4">FK&#95;NONE</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The source location which gave rise to the fixup, if any.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/loc">Loc</a>;</span></CodeLine>
